summary: Comprehensive testing of Grid/List view toggle functionality completed successfully. All 15 requirements from the review request passed without issues. Feature is fully functional with proper UI/UX, localStorage persistence, smooth transitions, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: View toggle visible with Grid and List buttons near filters section
Grid button active by default with primary color styling
List button switches to single-column full-width layout
Grid button switches back to 2-column grid layout
Active/inactive button visual highlighting working correctly
Smooth CSS transitions (transition-all duration-300) between views
View preference persists after page refresh via localStorage
Desktop grid view shows matches in 2-column grid (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2)
List view shows matches in single full-width column (flex flex-col)
All match content visible in both views (teams, scores, vote buttons, action buttons)
Team numbering (1/2) visible in both views (222 team number elements found)
Match minutes visible for LIVE matches (10 live badges, 10 match minutes found)
Top featured cards switch layout between grid and list properly
Previous features still work: league filters, search functionality, prediction locking
Mobile responsiveness - toggle works and is compact on mobile devices
Integration testing - view mode maintained during filter changes and search operations
